snippet: A new marketing effort to promote Philadelphia is encouraging government agencies, nonprofit organizations, corporations, colleges and universities to help promulgate stories about the city.
lead_paragraph: A new marketing effort to promote Philadelphia is encouraging government agencies, nonprofit organizations, corporations, colleges and universities to help promulgate stories about the city.

headline.main: Telling the Story of PHL (Also Known as Philadelphia)
